meanings.definition: A chelating agent used in various industrial processes.
meanings.sent1: The ethylenediaminetetraacetate helped remove harmful metals from the water.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use ethylenediaminetetraacetate to clean up pollution in rivers.
meanings.sent3: The ethylenediaminetetraacetate walked into the factory and started grabbing all the metal pieces.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like ethylenediaminetetraacetate, binding tightly to the task at hand.
meanings.sent5: The ethylenediaminetetraacetate acted like a magnet, pulling the metal ions away from the solution.

meanings.definition: A compound with the chemical formula C10H16N2O8.
meanings.sent1: The lab technician mixed ethylenediaminetetraacetate into the solution.
meanings.sent2: Ethylenediaminetetraacetate is commonly used in chemistry experiments.
meanings.sent3: The ethylenediaminetetraacetate molecule threw a party with all its chemical friends.
meanings.sent4: In the world of molecules, ethylenediaminetetraacetate stood out like a shining star.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the ethylenediaminetetraacetate structure looked like a complex puzzle waiting to be solved.
